query:
-- Configurações de backup
SELECT * FROM backup_config LIMIT 5;

-- Últimos 15 backups
SELECT 
  id,
  tenant_id,
  backup_type,
  status,
  size_bytes,
  duration_ms,
  is_encrypted,
  triggered_by,
  created_at
FROM backup_history 
ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 15;

-- Estatísticas gerais
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_backups,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sucesso,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as falhas,
  SUM(size_bytes) as tamanho_total_bytes,
  AVG(duration_ms) as duracao_media_ms,
  MIN(created_at) as primeiro_backup,
  MAX(created_at) as ultimo_backup
FROM backup_history;

  duration_ms,
  is_encrypted,
  triggered_by,
  created_at
FROM backup_history 
ORDER BY created_at DESC

-- Estatísticas gerais
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_backups,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sucesso,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as falhas,
  SUM(size_bytes) as tamanho_total_bytes,
  AVG(duration_ms) as duracao_media_ms,
  MIN(created_at) as primeiro_backup,
  MAX(created_at) as ultimo_backup
FROM backup_history;
